trans-unit.source: Associates a security action with a custom security attribute.
trans-unit.target: Knytter Sikkerhetshandlingen et egendefinert sikkerheten-attributt.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen er avskrevet og vil bli fjernet i en fremtidig versjon av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Oracle og ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values representing an action that can be performed using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref> verdiene som representerer en handling som utføres med deklarerende sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a blank password is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et tomt passord er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a blank password is allowed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et tomt passord er tillatt, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a permitted connection string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en gyldig tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Multiple connection strings may be identified.
trans-unit.target: Flere tilkoblingsstrenger kan identifiseres.

trans-unit.source: You may also provide additional connection string restrictions using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi ekstra tilkobling streng begrensninger ved å bruke <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions%2A>

trans-unit.source: A permitted connection string.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission"></xref> object that is configured according to the attribute properties.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission"> </xref> objektet som er konfigurert i henhold til attributtegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the list of connection string parameters identified by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*> property are the only connection string parameters allowed.
trans-unit.target: Angir om listen over streng tilkoblingsparameterne identifisert av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*>egenskapen er bare streng tilkoblingsparameterne tillatt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*>

trans-unit.source: One of the KeyRestrictionBehavior values.
trans-unit.target: Én av KeyRestrictionBehavior-verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets connection string parameters that are allowed or disallowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilkoblingen strengparametere som er tillatt eller ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Connection string parameters are identified in the form =.
trans-unit.target: Strengen tilkoblingsparameterne identifiseres formatet =.

trans-unit.source: Multiple parameters can be specified, delimited using a semicolon (;).
trans-unit.target: Flere parametere kan angis, atskilt med semikolon (;).

trans-unit.source: The connection string parameters listed may be identified as either the only additional parameters allowed or additional parameters that are not allowed using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Strengen tilkoblingsparameterne oppført kan være identifisert som enten bare tilleggsparametere tillatt eller flere parametere som ikke er tillatt å bruke den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no key restrictions are specified, and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A> property is set to `AllowOnly`, no additional connection string parameters are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen nøkkel begrensninger er angitt, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>er satt til `AllowOnly`, ingen ekstra tilkoblingsparameterne streng er tillatt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no key restrictions are specified, and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A> property is set to `PreventUsage`, additional connection string parameters are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen nøkkel begrensninger er angitt, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>er satt til `PreventUsage`, ekstra tilkoblingsstreng parametere er tillatt.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictionBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If more than one rule is set for the same connection string, the more restrictive rule is selected during the permission check.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn én regel er angitt for samme tilkoblingsstreng, velges mer restriktive regelen under kontroll av tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: One or more connection string parameters that are allowed or disallowed.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere streng tilkoblingsparameterne som er tillatt eller ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the attribute should serialize the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer om attributtet skal serialisere tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute should serialize the connection string; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis attributtet skal serialisere tilkoblingsstrengen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the attribute should serialize the set of key restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer om attributtet skal serialisere settet med key-begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute should serialize the set of key restrictions, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis attributtet skal serialisere settet med key-begrensninger, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
